details.rust_description:
[Group Limit] Max group size of 6, including sleeping players. 
 
          Welcome to Rusty Operations!
 
   Our server brings a unique expierence, offering a mixture of rebalanced
gameplay, premium plugins, and new maps. Suitable ping globally, No P2W
265 Server FPS Limit, Active Staff, DDoS Protection, and Dedicated Hardware.
 
          Modifications!
- Building and All Transport Entities Decay Rate Reduced (TC Needed).
- Gather & scrap 3x, less junk; sulfur 1.5x.
- Custom Maps including Puzzles & Monuments.
- 2 unique events & 1 addon event.
- Qaulity of life plugin improvements.
 
          Features & Plugins!        
       Furnace Splitter/Calculator - Clans/Upgraded Teams - Chat Tags
          Better Loot - Private Messages - Killfeed/DeathNotes
Referral Reward - Upgraded Map DeathMarks
   SAM Auth - Infinite Candles - Hijackable CH47
  Double Stack Resources and Charcoal - Vote Map - Balanced Economy
   SkinBoxVIP - SignArtistVIP - Info Panel - Detailed HUD - Shop
                                Queue SkipVIP - Advanced Reporting System
       Fuel Gauge - PilotEject Event - OilRigOpenDoorFix
        Lock On Rockets for Plane Crash Event - URLCopier
                    Raidable Bases+Tier3 Addon - ResearchProtection - AutoTeamAuth
Map Rotations - Customizable Storage Sorter - Vote Rewards
